page.title: 04EMPLOYMENT
page.content: As this is a farming area,most of the work is connected with agriculture. In the village of Walton on Trent, about 24% of the people are employed by the Electricity Board at Drakelow Power Station. About another 80% travel out of the area to work in the near-by towns and cities.The breweries,rubber factories and engineering works of Burton on Trent and Derby employ a lot of people from the surrounding areas. A small number are employed in the coal mines near Swadlincote and in the service industries. A rural area like this is also popular with people who work in education,the medical and other professions,so the village is a dormitory for people who work elsewhere.
